articles.description: Currently boasting a live rating of 2467.7, she stands a mere 32.3 Elo points away from becoming India's third female Grandmaster, following in the footsteps of Koneru Humpy and Harika Dronavalli
articles.content: Qatar Masters 2023 witnessed a momentous occasion as Vaishali Rameshbabu, the talented 22-year-old and sister of R Praggnanandhaa, secured her third and final Grandmaster (GM) norm. Despite losing he… [+2717 chars]
